aboutPage.aiSummarizationDesc: OpenRouter and Ollama integration with custom prompts
aboutPage.audioTranscriptionDesc: Whisper API and custom ASR support with high accuracy
aboutPage.inquireModeDesc: Semantic search across all your recordings
aboutPage.interactiveChatDesc: Chat with your transcriptions using AI
aboutPage.projectDescription: Transform your audio recordings into organized, searchable notes with AI-powered transcription, summarization, and interactive chat features.

account.chooseLanguageForInterface: Choose the language for the application interface
account.languageForSummaries: Language for titles, summaries, and chat. Leave blank for default (default behavior of your chosen models).
account.leaveBlankForAutoDetect: Leave blank for auto-detection by transcription service
account.title: Account Information

eventExtraction.title: Event Extraction
eventExtraction.enableLabel: Enable automatic event extraction from transcripts
eventExtraction.description: When enabled, the AI will identify meetings, appointments, and deadlines mentioned in your recordings and create downloadable calendar events.
eventExtraction.info: Extracted events will appear in an 'Events' tab on recordings where calendar items are detected.

transcriptTemplates.title: Transcript Templates
transcriptTemplates.description: Customize how transcripts are formatted for download and export.
transcriptTemplates.filters: Filters: |upper for uppercase, |srt for subtitle time format
transcriptTemplates.selectOrCreate: Select a template to edit or create a new one

adminDashboard.adminDefaultPromptDesc: The prompt configured above (shown on this page)

contextNotes.jsonConversion: JSON transcripts are converted to clean text format before sending
contextNotes.modelConfig: The model used is configured via TEXT_MODEL_NAME environment variable
contextNotes.tagPrompts: If multiple tag prompts exist, they are merged in the order tags were added
contextNotes.transcriptLimit: Transcripts are limited to a configurable character count (default: 30,000)

adminDashboard.defaultPromptInfo: This default prompt will be used for all users who haven't set their own custom prompt in their account settings.

errors.failedToSavePrompt: Failed to save default prompt. Please try again.
errors.invalidFileSize: Please enter a valid size between 1 and 10000 MB
errors.minCharacters: Please enter a valid number of at least 1000 characters
errors.minTimeout: Timeout must be at least 60 seconds

adminDashboard.inquireModeDescription: Inquire Mode allows users to search across multiple transcriptions using natural language questions. It works by breaking transcriptions into chunks and creating searchable embeddings using AI models.
adminDashboard.languagePreferenceNote: Note: If the user has set an output language preference, " Ensure your response is in {language}." will be added.
adminDashboard.maxFileSizeHelp: Maximum file size in megabytes (1-10000 MB)
adminDashboard.newPasswordLabel: New Password (leave blank to keep current)
adminDashboard.placeholdersNote: Placeholders are replaced with actual values when processing a recording.
adminDashboard.promptDescription: This prompt will be used to generate summaries for all recordings when users haven't set their own prompt.
adminDashboard.promptPriorityDescription: The system uses the following priority order when selecting which prompt to use:
adminDashboard.promptResetMessage: Prompt reset to system default. Click "Save Changes" to apply.
adminDashboard.recordingsNeedProcessing: There are {{count}} recordings that need to be processed for Inquire Mode.

settings.asrTimeoutDesc: Maximum time in seconds to wait for ASR transcription to complete. Default is 1800 seconds (30 minutes).
settings.defaultSummaryPromptDesc: Default summarization prompt used when users have not set their own prompt. This serves as the base prompt for all users.
settings.maxFileSizeDesc: Maximum file size allowed for audio uploads in megabytes (MB).
settings.recordingDisclaimerDesc: Legal disclaimer shown to users before recording starts. Supports Markdown formatting. Leave empty to disable.
settings.transcriptLengthLimitDesc: Maximum number of characters to send from transcript to LLM for summarization and chat. Use -1 for no limit.

adminDashboard.systemFallbackDesc: A hardcoded default if none of the above are set
adminDashboard.tagCustomPromptDesc: If a recording has tags with custom prompts
adminDashboard.timeoutRecommendation: Recommended: 30-120 minutes for long audio files
adminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
adminDashboard.userCustomPromptDesc: If the user has set their own prompt in account settings
adminDashboard.vectorStoreUpToDate: The vector store is up to date.

changePasswordModal.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 8 characters long
changePasswordModal.title: Change Password

chat.availableAfterTranscription: Chat will be available once transcription is complete
chat.placeholder: Ask a question about this recording...
chat.placeholderWithHint: Ask a question about this recording... (Enter to send, Ctrl+Enter for new line)
chat.title: Chat

colorScheme.chooseRecording: Choose a recording from the sidebar to view its transcription and summary
colorScheme.subtitle: Customize your interface with beautiful color themes
colorScheme.title: Color Scheme

customPrompts.currentDefaultPrompt: Current Default Prompt (Used if you leave the above blank)
customPrompts.promptDescription: This prompt will be used to generate summaries for your transcriptions. It overrides the admin's default prompt.
customPrompts.promptPlaceholder: Describe how you want your summaries structured. Leave blank to use the admin's default prompt.
customPrompts.tip1: Be specific about the sections you want in your summary
customPrompts.tip2: Use clear formatting instructions (e.g., "Use bullet points", "Create numbered lists")
customPrompts.tip3: Specify if you want certain information prioritized
customPrompts.tip4: The system will automatically provide the transcript content to the AI
customPrompts.tip5: Your output language preference (if set) will be applied automatically

deleteAllSpeakersModal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all saved speakers? This action cannot be undone.
deleteAllSpeakersModal.title: Delete All Speakers

deleteRecording.message: Are you sure you want to delete this recording? This action cannot be undone.
deleteRecording.title: Delete Recording

deleteShare.message: Are you sure you want to delete this share? This will revoke access to the public link.
deleteShare.title: Delete Share

reprocessTranscription.message: Are you sure you want to reprocess this transcription? The current transcription will be replaced.
reprocessTranscription.title: Reprocess Transcription

unsavedChanges.message: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them before leaving?
unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes

editTagModal.asrSettingsDescription: These settings will be applied by default when using this tag with ASR transcription
editTagModal.colorDescription: Choose a color for easy identification
editTagModal.customPromptPlaceholder: Optional: Custom prompt for generating summaries for recordings with this tag
editTagModal.defaultPromptPlaceholder: Leer lassen, um Ihren Standard-Zusammenfassungs-Prompt zu verwenden
editTagModal.leaveBlankPrompt: Leave blank to use your default summary prompt
editTagModal.title: Edit Tag

errors.audioRecordingFailed: 音频录制失败。请检查您的麦克风。
errors.networkError: 网络错误。请检查您的连接。
errors.serverError: 服务器错误。请稍后重试。

form.notesPlaceholder: Type your notes in Markdown format...
form.title: Title

help.bothAudioDesc: Records your voice + meeting participants (recommended for online meetings)
help.createPublicLink: Create a public link to share this recording. Sharing is only available on secure (HTTPS) connections.
help.processingTimeDescription: This may take a few minutes to complete. You can continue using the app while processing.
help.recordSystemSteps3: Make sure to check the box that says
help.sharingWindowNoAudio: Sharing a "Window" will not capture audio.
help.systemAudioDesc: Records meeting participants and system sounds
help.toCaptureAudioFromMeetings: To capture audio from meetings or other apps, you must share your screen or a browser tab.
help.youHaveXSpeakers: You have {{count}} speakers, but only 8 unique colors are available. Colors will repeat after the 8th speaker.

inquire.title: Inquire
inquire.speakerRequirement: Speaker identification requires recordings with multiple speakers
inquire.selectFilters: Select filters on the left to narrow down your transcriptions, then ask questions to get insights from your recordings.
inquire.exampleQuestion2: "When did we decide to change the timeline?"
inquire.exampleQuestion3: "What concerns were raised about the budget?"
inquire.exampleQuestion4: "Who was responsible for the marketing tasks?"
inquire.placeholder: Ask questions about your filtered transcriptions...
inquire.sendHint: Press Enter to send • Ctrl+Enter for new line

speakersManagement.description: Manage your saved speakers. These are automatically saved when you use speaker names in your recordings.
speakersManagement.speakersWillAppear: Speakers will appear here when you use speaker names in your recordings

manageSpeakersModal.description: Manage your saved speakers. These are automatically saved when you use speaker names in your recordings.
manageSpeakersModal.speakersWillAppear: Speakers will appear here when you use speaker names in your recordings
manageSpeakersModal.title: Manage Speakers

recording.systemAudioNotSupported: System audio recording is not supported in this browser
recording.title: Audio Recording

reprocessModal.audioReTranscribedFromScratch: The audio will be re-transcribed from scratch. This will also regenerate the title and summary based on the new transcription.
reprocessModal.audioReTranscribedWithAsr: The audio will be re-transcribed using the ASR endpoint. This includes diarization and will regenerate the title and summary.
reprocessModal.manualEditsOverwritten: Any manual edits to the transcription, title, or summary will be overwritten.
reprocessModal.manualEditsOverwrittenSummary: Any manual edits to the title or summary will be overwritten.
reprocessModal.newTitleAndSummary: A new title and summary will be generated based on the existing transcription.

upload.chunking: Large files will be automatically chunked for processing
